song.title: Automatic Girlfriend
song.info:
Do not listen to it. Run if you want to live. Run fast!
No normal man can listen to it and remain normal - or even survive - because this is THE LOWEST LO-FI possible.
OK, 1-bit fully digital music. Only 34Kb of data (samples+notes). 1 channel, software mixing to 3ch, no volumes, no sound-card, no nothing. ;) ;) ;) Only 3,5Mhz CPU and 1-bit transducer on the output.
It gives us BEEPER *.mod-like music on regular ZX Spectrum 48K. Equals: total noise.
Do not listen to it from emulator. If you must - turn the trebles down. Almost to minimum. Emulator adds noise that is not present on real machine (well, it is but in a much smaller degree).
Composed on SampleTracker (that allows only 16 samples and 16 patterns. I used here 8 samples and 14 patterns here).
Recorded from Real Hardware for a glory of 1-bit noise.
